titles.title: Recognizing the Weatherization Assistance Program during its 40th anniversary year for its history of reducing the energy costs of families with low incomes, making low-income households healthier and safer, positively impacting the environment, and supporting jobs and new technology.

Recognizing the Weatherization Assistance Program during its 40th anniversary year for its history of reducing the energy costs of families with low incomes, making low-income households healthier and safer, positively impacting the environment, and supporting jobs and new technology.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the Weatherization Assistance Program for 40 years of reducing the energy burden on low-income families, positively impacting the environment, and supporting jobs and newtechnology.
Encourages the Weatherization Assistance Program to continue performing essential weatherization services going forward.
Applaudsthe dedicated professionals at the federal, state, and local levels who run the daily operations of the Weatherization Assistance Program.
